rules.name: And They Shall Know No Fear
rules.description: You can re-roll failed Morale tests for this unit.

rules.name: Special Issue Ammunition
rules.description:
When this unit fires any ranged weapons from the following list, you can choose for it to fire special ammunition. If you do so, the Bolter Discipline ability does not apply when resolving their shots, but you instead choose one kind of ammunition from the table to the right and apply the corresponding modifier. 

(absolver bolt pistol, auto bolt rifle, bolt carbine, bolt pistol(and heavy), boltgun(and combi), bolt rifle twin boltgun, stalker pattern boltgun/rifle, storm bolter, hellfire extremis(boltgun profile), all master crafted bolt weapons or a guardian spear) Table: Dragonfire Bolt, Hellfire Round, Kraken Bolt, Vengeance Round

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Roll a D6 whenever Watch Captain Artemis loses a wound.  On a 6, he does not lose that wound.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: This model has a 4+ invulnerable save.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 made for friendly <CHAPTER> units within 6" of this model.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: This weapon automatically hits its target, and wounds on a 2+, unless it is targeting a VEHICLE, in which case it wounds on a 6+

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: When attacking with this weapon, choose one or both of the profiles below.  If you choose both, subtract 1 from all hit rolls made for this weapon.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: This weapon can only be used once per battle.  If the attack hits, deal D6 mortal wounds to your target.  If it misses, Watch Captain Artemis suffers D6 mortal wounds.

rules.name: Special Issue Ammunition
rules.description:
When this unit fires any ranged weapons from the following list, you can choose for it to fire special ammunition. If you do so, the Bolter Discipline ability does not apply when resolving their shots, but you instead choose one kind of ammunition from the table to the right and apply the corresponding modifier. 

(absolver bolt pistol, auto bolt rifle, bolt carbine, bolt pistol(and heavy), boltgun(and combi), bolt rifle twin boltgun, stalker pattern boltgun/rifle, storm bolter, hellfire extremis(boltgun profile), all master crafted bolt weapons or a guardian spear) Table: Dragonfire Bolt, Hellfire Round, Kraken Bolt, Vengeance Round

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value:
A unit of Veterans can contain models with different Toughness characteristics. If this is the case,  use the Toughness characteristic of the majority of the models in the unit when the enemy makes wound rolls against it. If there is no majority, the Deathwatch player can choose which of the values is used. For the purposes of the Bolter Discipline ability and for determining what models a vehicle can transport, Terminators have the Terminator keyword, Bikers do not have the Infantry keyword and instead have the Biker keyword, and Vanguard Veterans have the Jump Pack keyword. 

For the purposes of setting up on or moving through Battlefield Terrain, this unit is treated as an Infantry unit, even if it contains any Biker models.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: During the Movement phase, Vanguard Veterans can move across models as if they were not there, and when moving across terrain features, vertical distance is not counted against the total these models can move (i.e. moving vertically is free for these models in the Movement phase). During the Charge phase, Vanguard Veterans can move across models (other than Buildings) as if they were not there. When a Kill Team that includes any Vanguard Veterans Falls Back, it can shoot later that turn as if it could FLY.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Before deployment at the start of the game, a unit with this ability containing 10 models may be split into two units, each containing 5 models. Units of Agressors, Bikers or Inceptors containing 6 models can also be split into two units, each containing 3 models.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: This weapon Automatically hits its target.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: If the target is within 1/2 range of this weapon its attacks are resolved with a Strength of 9 and an AP of -3
